desc: Apparel for dog-mums and dog-dads that love exploring the outdoors with their furbabies right next to them. Adventures to the beach, mountains, lakes and cafes, OMFD (OhMyFluffyDog) has you covered! Sharing the love by donating 10% of all sales to a new charity each month.
